numeric.name: error_delay
numeric.doc: the amount of time in microseconds for which the bcm_linkscan module will suspend a port from further update processing after 'max_error' errors are detected. After this delay, the error state for the port is cleared and normal linkscan processing resumes on the port

numeric.name: max_error
numeric.doc: The number of port update errors which will cause the bcm_linkscan module to suspend a port from update processing for the period of time set in 'error_delay'

numeric.name: thread_priority
numeric.doc: specifies the priority of the BCM Linkscan thread
